review: Doesn't even deserve one star. Does not maintain a wifi connection, completely ineffective. I'm returning it.

review: The fire stick is great. I love the remote that comes with it. I can plug it in anywhere. I love the app for my phone that duplicates as a remote. Great apps included for Netflix and Flixter and other services. I would have given another star except that sometimes the movies don't play well. That may be because of my slow Time-Warner service, not Amazon. I also own a Chromecast. I like both. It's worth it to own both.
author: Dan Q

review: It was pretty cool but I wish you could add more memory and add an update where you can still play the games without looking for internet if you don't have internet
